title: Strengthening Service Quality Competencies: OBE-CDIO-Based Closed-Loop IoT Engineering Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming, embedded systems, and network communication
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply the CDIO (Conceive, Design, Implement, Operate) framework to IoT system design processes to solve real industrial problems.
Learners can enhance individual technical competencies by at least 80% to achieve defined learning outcomes based on Outcome-Based Education (OBE) principles.
Learners cultivate practical adaptability through hands-on experience in developing and operating IoT prototypes in simulation/VR environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
